subject: Baseball
Minor Leagues
lead_paragraph: L. J. Mazzilli, the son of Lee Mazzilli, who helped the Mets win the 1986 World Series, is in his first spring training camp since being drafted last June.
snippet: L. J. Mazzilli, the son of Lee Mazzilli, who helped the Mets win the 1986 World Series, is in his first spring training camp since being drafted last June.
